title: Genesis Chapter 12 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 12 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did Pharaoh do in Genesis 12:20?
options: Built an altar to the Lord
questions.explanation: Genesis 12:20 states: "And Pharaoh commanded his men concerning him: and they sent him away, and his wife, and all that he had."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 12:2: "And I will ______ of thee a great nation, and I will bless thee, and ______ thy name great; and thou shalt be a blessing:"
